entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with rain beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
